comment: He doesn't know how to teach and expects us to know it already. He reads the textbook and rarely gives his own knowledge. His tests are nothing like the homework and doesn't like helping anyone. I'm afraid to ask him questions because he belittles anyone who asks him a question. If we already knew how to do this, we wouldn't be taking this class.

He reads directly from the book through the entirety of class. Rarely if ever offers any his own personal knowledge. Note-taking is very hard. Test criteria is unclear. Study the wrong thing and you will not pass. If you already know your stuff, just stay at home, read the book, work the examples, and show up for the tests (he calls them quizzes).

Wilson is very intimidating , and It can be scary to ask questions. His class is like a hardware design bootcamp. But like bootcamp you will get through it if you enjoy the subject matter, want to learn, and are not lazy. He is a great professor to whip you into shape for D3.

If you have no prior background in Digital this class will be very difficult. Professor is not clear and concise during lecture. The professor will only read from the textbook. Homework is also assigned from the textbook. The professor also does not like to help in lab. Test are very difficult, the material is not similar to homework.

Professor Wilson is terrible. He does not give any partial credit and will dock points off homework and tests for eraser marks.  Also his tests are nothing like the homework.  He also does not like to help students with anything.  He gets upset very easily if you make a mistake and he will belittle you if you try to question him.

Mr.Wilson is an awful professor. He reads straight from the text book and has no original material to teach. He refuses to answer student questions and he will intimidate the students that ask questions because he does not want to answer the student's question. He also refuses to help students in lab. Avoid him at all costs!

Great sense of humor, enjoy the laughter because the projects will make you cry. Wilson makes you work, but the knowledge you take away is invaluable. Wilson uses and literally edits the textbook used. He seems to enjoy Dunkin Doughnuts coffee and "crafty code."

Very tough class. Prof will push your limits but if you are willing to learn and show up to every class with an eager attitude he is more than willing to help. he will not give you the answers, but he will help push you along. Fantastic class! don't expect and A, but you will learn more than you'll know what to do with. A+ professor
This teacher is very hard!!!! Expects a lot out of each student.  I have never struggled in a class until I took this one.  I have only made 1 C in my lifetime and in this class I am praying for a C.
If you are willing to work very hard, this is the teacher to take. You will learn more than you can possibly imagine.
Very easy teacher. take him if you can.

Sets high standards, but does help you try to achieve them IF you're willing.  If you want a professor to just do it all for you, find somebody else.  Not overly stringent on deadlines, and doesn't have the best availability.
Teaches very very fast.  Unclear about points.  spends more time talking about what he is doing than explaining what he is doing.
